materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a Ravenala tree, named the Travellers' Tree, in Singapore. The tall tree is in th center of the photograph, in the middle of a small clearing. There is a man on the left of the tree. He is wearing a long-sleeved top with a samping around his waist. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Travellers' Tree, Singapore
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Singapore Traveler's tree
